Articles.Content:
AAAAAAAAGGH!!!

Just so you know, the Kraken doesn't like things going that fast.
Actually it's the kraken that makes things go that fast

Actually, I made it go that fast. I was suddenly compelled to reach Lightspeed, so I *cough*editedsomeconfigs*cough*

And that is the result of a 5 second burn when an engine has 100,000 thrust.

EDIT:

That is over 65 times the speed of light.

Plaid, anyone?
All we heard from Jeb was "Good, now make it go faster"
using that 100,000 thrust, turn it around. aim at kerbol. sundive. burn at apoapsis. make it FASTER.
That's too funny with the numbers on the nav ball extending out over the edges of the speed indicator! ,,, nice job!

Look at the mission timer.

1 min 41 seconds.

Yeeaaaaaaaaah...

And the engine broke off.

I need to fix it a little bit...

(I commented the CFG files to tell me the original values. That's good.)
